scripts.dev: bunx concurrently -n server,ui -c auto "bun run --cwd abroad-server dev" "bun run --cwd abroad-ui dev"
scripts.build: bun run --cwd abroad-server build && bun run --cwd abroad-ui build
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd abroad-server lint && bun run --cwd abroad-ui lint
scripts.format: bun run --cwd abroad-server format && bun run --cwd abroad-ui lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: bun run --cwd abroad-server typecheck && bun run --cwd abroad-ui typecheck
